section.title: commissions gross margin and Gross Margin Commissions
section.para: The gross margin commissions report is part of the XWD package for distribution. To view gross margin commissions, go to Sales > Reports > Gross Margin Commissions. The following screen will appear:
When displaying gross margin commissions, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display gross margin commissions for all outside sales representatives.
Specify outside sales representative whose gross margin commissions you want to display.
Select to display gross margin commissions for all inside sales representatives.
Specify inside sales representative whose gross margin commissions you want to display.
Gross margin commissions occurring on or after this date will display.
Gross margin commissions occurring on or before this date will display.
Select to include commissions on miscellaneous charges and miscellaneous items.
Select the sale type whose gross margin commissions you want to display.
Display lists gross margin commissions for the specified sales representative(s), using the specified parameters.
